hero.description: Dofollo audits your internal link structure, finds missed opportunities across every page, and places the right links — without you opening a single editor.
hero.trust_text: Used by SEO teams & agencies worldwide

problem_section.heading_highlight: It's Not Ranking Because of Links.
problem_section.subheading: Most SEO teams fix keywords and backlinks — but ignore the internal link graph that Google uses to understand site authority.

problems.title: Link Equity Is Leaking
problems.description: High-authority pages sit unconnected. Link equity that should flow to your money pages is going nowhere.

problems.title: Hours Wasted Per Client
problems.description: Finding link opportunities manually across 500+ pages takes days. That's billable time you're giving away.

problems.title: Crawlers Miss Your Pages
problems.description: Orphan pages and shallow link depth mean Google bots deprioritize your content before anyone reads it.

problems.title: Competitors Outrank You
problems.description: They're not smarter — they have tighter site structures. Better internal linking = faster ranking gains.

workflow_section.description: No more spreadsheets, no more guesswork. Dofollo maps your entire content graph and surfaces exactly where to add links — then adds them for you.

steps.title: Site-Wide Link Audit
steps.description: Dofollo crawls every page of your site, mapping existing links and exposing orphan pages, broken links, and underlinked content.

steps.title: AI Link Suggestions
steps.description: Our engine surfaces semantically relevant anchor text opportunities — ranked by link equity impact, not guesswork.

steps.title: One-Click Publishing
steps.description: Approve in bulk. Dofollo pushes links directly to your CMS with the right anchor text — no editing pages one by one.

product_showcase.description: A visual link graph that shows exactly how authority moves through your site — and where it's getting stuck.

visualizer_section.title: See How Authority Flows
visualizer_section.description: Understand which pages pass link equity, which pages receive it, and which ones are completely isolated from your link graph.

competitor_analysis.description: Enter any competitor's domain and instantly map their internal link strategy. Find the gaps they've exploited — and the ones they've missed — then apply it to your own site.

testimonials.quote: "We manage 30+ client sites. Dofollo's link graph shows me where every page sits in the authority flow. I deliver it as a service now — clients see the before/after and love it."
testimonials.author: Rachel M.

testimonials.quote: "The anchor text AI is genuinely uncanny. It reads the page context and picks the exact phrasing a real SEO would choose. My content team thinks I'm writing them manually."
testimonials.author: James T.

testimonials.quote: "140 orphan pages on a site I thought I knew. Dofollo found them all in minutes. Four weeks after fixing — three of those pages hit page one. I'll never audit manually again."
testimonials.author: Priya S.

items.question: What does Dofollo actually do?
items.answer: Dofollo is an AI-powered internal link management platform. It audits your site's link structure, identifies pages that are underlinked or disconnected, suggests semantically relevant internal links with proper anchor text, and publishes approved links directly to your CMS — all without manually editing pages.

items.question: How quickly can I see results?
items.answer: Setup takes under 5 minutes. Your first audit results are ready in seconds. Most users see ranking improvements within 3–8 weeks of implementing Dofollo's suggestions, depending on their site's crawl frequency and content volume.

items.question: What SEO impact should I expect?
items.answer: Users typically report stronger crawl coverage, reduced orphan pages, and improved rankings for target keywords. On average, teams see +34% organic traffic lift and +65% link coverage improvements within the first 90 days.

items.question: Which platforms does Dofollo integrate with?
items.answer: Dofollo integrates natively with WordPress and Google Search Console. It also works with Shopify, WooCommerce, and custom-built sites. Links are published directly — no plugin installations or developer access required.

items.question: Does it find orphan pages and broken links?
items.answer: Yes. Dofollo's audit flags all orphan pages (pages with no internal links pointing to them) and broken internal links. You can see them at a glance and either fix or connect them directly from your dashboard.

items.question: Do I need technical SEO knowledge to use it?
items.answer: No. Dofollo is built for SEO professionals of all levels. You don't need backend access or developer involvement — just add your site, review AI suggestions, and approve what you want to publish.

items.question: Is there a free trial?
items.answer: Yes — Dofollo offers a 14-day free trial with no credit card required. You get full access to the audit, suggestions, and publishing features so you can see real results before committing.

items.question: Do you have a mobile app?
items.answer: Dofollo is a web-based platform that works on all modern browsers, including mobile. A dedicated iOS and Android app is on the roadmap based on user demand.

final_cta.description: Join 2,000+ SEO professionals using Dofollo to fix their internal link structure and recover rankings they should already own.
final_cta.footer_note: 14-DAY FREE TRIAL · NO CREDIT CARD REQUIRED · CANCEL ANYTIME
